docs.snippet: Liverpool's quest for a first English league title since 1990 has foundered on naive football in two matches where a less gung-ho approach might have produced four points instead of one....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool's quest for a first English league title since 1990 has foundered on naive football in two matches where a less gung-ho approach might have produced four points instead of one.

headline.main: Analysis-Naive Liverpool's Title Challenge Founders in Defence
headline.print_headline: Analysis-Naive Liverpool's Title Challenge Founders in Defence

docs.snippet: Juventus, winners of a third successive Serie A title on Sunday, must now decide whether the formula which has given them a firm grip on Italian football will keep working for another season and make an impact in the Champions League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Juventus, winners of a third successive Serie A title on Sunday, must now decide whether the formula which has given them a firm grip on Italian football will keep working for another season and make an impact in the Champions League.

headline.main: Juve Seek Means to Take Domestic Dominance Into Europe
headline.print_headline: Juve Seek Means to Take Domestic Dominance Into Europe
